meanings.definition: A person or thing that is badly made or formed.
meanings.sent1: The miscreation stumbled clumsily through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The artist was disappointed with the miscreation of his sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The miscreation of a cake with too much salt tasted like a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her miscreation of a friendship was like building a house on sand.
meanings.sent5: The miscreation of the robot made it malfunction constantly.

meanings.sent2: The miscreation of the plan caused chaos among the team.

meanings.sent4: The miscreation of a new language was a bold but confusing endeavor.
meanings.sent5: The miscreation of a new species in the lab was both fascinating and terrifying.
